title: Turkey pho
ingredients: ['1 whole cardamom pod', '2 whole cloves', '1 star anise pod', '1 teaspoon fennel seeds', '2 teaspoons coriander seed', '1 (5m) piece fresh ginger, peeled and smashed', '1/2 onion, peeled', '1 turkey carcass', '2L water, or more as needed', '450g rice noodles', '4 tablespoons fish sauce', 'salt to taste', '140g leftover cooked turkey, shredded', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil leaves (optional)', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh coriander (optional)', '1/4 onion, thinly sliced (optional)', '1 lime, cut into wedges (optional)', '1 tablespoon hot chilli sauce, or to taste (optional)']
